metaDescription: XCHscan is the leading Blockchain Explorer, Search, API and Analytics Platform for Chia blockchain, a decentralized smart contracts platform.
heading: About XCHscan
content: XCHscan is the leading Blockchain Explorer, Search, API and Analytics Platform for Chia blockchain, a decentralized smart contracts platform. Built and launched in 2021, it is one of the earliest projects built around Chia blockchain and its community with the mission of providing equitable access to blockchain data.
